required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase II Study of HMPL-453 Tartrate in Patients With Advanced Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma With FGFR2 Fusion
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Multicenter, Open-label Phase II Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of HMPL-453 Tartrate in Patients With Advanced Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma With FGFR2 Fusion

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase II, single arm, multicenter and open-label study to evaluate the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetic of HMPL-453 tartrate in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma with FGFR2 fusion.

detailed_description.textblock: Around 29 patients with metastatic or local advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma with FGFR2 fusion, who have failed at least one systemic therapy will be treated with HMPL-453 till disease progression or death.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured up to 6 months after the last patient has been enrolled or all patients have finished their last PFS follow up, whichever comes first
primary_outcome.description: Evaluating ORR of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured up to 6 months after the last patient has been enrolled or all patients have finished their last PFS follow up, whichever comes first
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluating DCR of week 12 of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma
Evaluating 12 weeks DCR of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma
Evaluating TTR of HMPL-453 in patients who achieved partial response or complete response according to mRECIST 1.1
Evaluating DoR of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma
Evaluating 12 weeks PFS of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma
Evaluating PFS of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma
Evaluating OS of HMPL-453 in patients with advanced intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma
